Title: Enhanced Forms
Description: Enhanced forms extends the regular ASP.NET input and validation controls to give some flare to your projects and provide new features which makes the user experience much nicer. For a demonstration please visit http://www.ronald-douglas.com/Projects
HomeWiki:
Project Description
Enhanced forms extends the regular ASP.NET input and validation controls to give some flare to your projects and provide new features which makes the user experience much nicer. For a demonstration please visit http://www.ronald-douglas.com/Projects

To see a demo in action visit http://www.ronald-douglas.com/Projects
